Elements.Name: Cyber
Description:
Allows Sonic's cyber corruption model to be replaced.

Only use if a character mod supports this.

Elements.Name: Effect
Description:
Allows Super Sonic's punch and kick effects to be replaced.

Only use if a character mod supports this.

Elements.Name: Realtime
Description:
Allows the real-time models to be replaced.

Only use if a character mod supports this.
